instructions.elevenlabs_api_key: Add your ElevenLabs API key here for high-quality voice cloning
setup_instructions: 2. Get your API key from your profile settings
3. Add it to the 'elevenlabs_api_key' field above
4. The system will automatically use voice cloning if available
free_alternatives: Coqui TTS: Free open-source voice cloning (will be used as fallback)
Enhanced pyttsx3: Improved voice selection based on reference analysis
